kizuna_home_b_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Hello, M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss [VAR TRNAME(0000)] of class
1-A.\r
It\r
has\r
been\r
some\r
time\r
since\r
last\r
we met.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_b_02: Are you here to eat as well?[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_b_select_02: I just kind of wandered in
kizuna_home_b_03a:
Ha! Excellent. You shouldn’t battle on an empty
stomach.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_b_03b: Drawn in by the irresistible aromas, I imagine.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_b_04:
I myself am here to...survey the student cafeteria,
let’s say.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_b_05:
I am observing the nutritional content of the food
that our students partake of on a regular basis.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_b_06:
One item on the menu here that I am particularly
interested in is the Peanut Butter Sandwich.\r
It is sweet and quite delicious.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_b_07: Yes...perhaps I will order one right now.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_b_mob_01:
Oh look! It’s Mr. Saguaro! He’s so fashionable
and cool.
kizuna_home_b_mob_02:
I guess the teachers come to the cafeteria too,
huh? D’you think he’ll have an Egg Sandwich?
kizuna_home_b_mob_03:
No way! If he gets anything here, it’ll definitely
be something spicy, like the Five-Alarm Sandwich!
kizuna_home_b_mob_04:
Ahhh! He’s so cool! He’ll definitely get that wild
and spicy Five-Alarm Sandwich!
kizuna_home_b_09:
Could I have a...Five-Alarm Sandwich? I do enjoy
the thrill of spicy food.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_b_select_04: No! Have a Peanut Butter Sandwich!
kizuna_home_b_10:
[VAR BD06(0000)]A-ah, yes. You suggested I have a Peanut Butter
Sandwich,\r
M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss\r
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]?\r
I\r
suppose\r
I\r
shall\r
have\r
to\r
try\r
one.\r
If\r
you insist.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_b_11:
That was close. I almost forced myself to order
something spicy—my least favorite of flavors.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_b_12:
[VAR BD06(0000)]I thank you for restraining me,
M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss [VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_b_13:
It seems that the students tend to view me as
fashionable and cool...or even—dare I say it?—\r
exuding a sort of brooding strength.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_b_14:
I have a habit of acting in such a way so as not to
destroy their image of me.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_b_15:
I showed my true colors to you just now without
thinking. Please keep this as a secret between us.[VAR 0114(0029)]
kizuna_home_b_system_01: You became even closer with Mr. Saguaro!
